issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: In a non-HA environment, RM UI (v1) displays  *ResourceManager HA state: active* which is misleading.
fields.summary: About page in RM UI displays misleading HA state

This is just 1 line change, I follow the old indentation level but it gives a checkstyle warning, not sure if it matters. This is a trivial change, can someone help to take a look?
This seems no longer important since yarn new UI is coming, closing this one now.
